alert.note: Alert for Cottle (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 5:30PM CDT until May 04 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL COTTLE COUNTY... At 529 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Paducah, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Paducah. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northwestern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
